participant_1.background:
I enjoy the thrill of playing tennis and the freedom of driving my restored Mustang.
I love spending my free time taking photos with my best friend.
I moved to work for an organization that better aligns with my values.
i use to be a huge superman fan as a child.
i am terrible at math.

participant_2.background:
I've had to say goodbye to my cat, who was my best friend.
I had to learn to adapt to a new way of life after my farm was foreclosed.
I enjoy a good debate with myself on my free time, perhaps over a glass of expensive wine.
I usually spend my free time helping people in need.
I spent the year creating a series of paintings inspired by my favorite childhood books.

content.text: Hey! I'm so sorry to hear about your cat. I know what it's like to lose a beloved pet.
Thank you. I'm still getting used to life without her.
I'm sure you'll be okay. I've had to learn to adapt to some big changes in my life too.
I had to move to work for an organization that better aligned with my values. It was a big change, but it's been a good one.
I'm glad to hear that. I know how important it is to be happy with your work.
Me too. What do you like to do in your free time?
I love spending time helping people in need. I also enjoy painting and writing.
That's great! I love to take photos and spend time with my best friend.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. I'm glad I met you!
